Room.Name: Darmanian Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Darmanian Way, east of the great City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the intersection with Adlermann Way to the west and the large City Walls just to the west of the road. On the north side of the road are the Oceancrest North City Guard Barracks, housing more than one thousand highly trained guards. On the south side of the street is the Lithium Lanterns shop, selling all varieties of light sources.
